papers.title: Rho-Perfect: Correlation Ceiling For Subjective Evaluation Datasets
papers.summary: Subjective ratings contain inherent noise that limits the model-human correlation, but this reliability issue is rarely quantified. In this paper, we present $ρ$-Perfect, a practical estimation of the highest achievable correlation of a model on subjectively rated datasets. We define $ρ$-Perfect to be the correlation between a perfect predictor and human ratings, and derive an estimate of the value based on heteroscedastic noise scenarios, a common occurrence in subjectively rated datasets. papers.title: 物理引导的无监督声源追踪变分模型
papers.summary: 声源追踪通常采用经典的阵列处理算法进行。替代方法，如机器学习，依赖于真实位置标签，这些标签获取成本高昂。我们提出了一种变分模型，能够在潜在空间中执行单源无监督声源追踪，并辅以基于物理的解码器。
